title: PaperCut NG pc-web-print Link Following Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of PaperCut NG Server. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the pc-web-print service. By creating a symbolic link, an attacker can abuse the service to delete a file. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: PaperCut has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.papercut.com/kb/Main/Security-Bulletin-May-2024
timeline:
2024-03-15 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-07-31 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2024-07-31 - Advisory Updated
credit: Nicholas Zubrisky (@NZubrisky) and Michael DePlante (@izobashi) of Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative
